description:
Maine's Top Injury Lawyers Are Here For You And Your Family

From our law office in Falmouth, Maine, the award-winning trial attorneys at Peter Thompson & Associates are fully committed to helping you obtain justice in the wake of a debilitating injury or devastating loss caused by someone else.

Unprecedented Success

Handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, our law firm's attorneys have more than 60 years of combined legal experience among them, and we have achieved a success rate of more than 98 percent for those suffering from another party's negligence or wrongdoing.

Last year alone, we recovered over $15,000,000 for our clients and were voted, for the 10 year in a row, Greater Portland area’s “Best Personal Injury Lawyers”. Our track record of success and high client satisfaction ratings have earned our firm U.S. News & World Report’s “Best Law Firms” rating, and we have received numerous other accolades as well.

This success comes from our extensive trial experience and our use of highly qualified medical experts and other industry professionals who help us build the strongest cases possible for those we serve.

Discuss Your Needs Free Of Charge

You do not have to suffer alone. By contacting Peter Thompson & Associates and taking advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation, you can discover why so many throughout our region trust us with their most important and pressing legal challenges.
